trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base para todos os filtros de mensagem de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events.
trans-unit.target: O designer de fluxo de trabalho fornece um `Strategy` padrão de design para criar objetos de filtro de mensagem substituível para manipular eventos.

trans-unit.source: Derive from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events.
trans-unit.target: Derivam de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> classe para criar filtros de mensagem que podem responder a eventos no designer de fluxo de trabalho, como operações de arrastar, as operações de layout e de pintura e outros eventos de designer.

trans-unit.source: To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> or override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um filtro de mensagem personalizada para a cadeia de filtros de mensagem, chame o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> ou substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> propriedade virtual em personalizado atividade de raiz e adicionar o filtro de mensagem personalizada na coleção retornada da classe base.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a custom designer message filter that derives from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra um filtro de mensagem personalizada de designer que deriva de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>.

trans-unit.source: The class, named `CustomMessageFilter`, overrides a number of its base class methods including <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseMove%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseUp%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseEnter%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseHover%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseLeave%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragOver%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A classe denominada `CustomMessageFilter`, substitui um número de seus métodos de classe base incluindo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseMove%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseUp%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseEnter%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseHover%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseLeave%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragOver%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do básico Designer hospedagem SDK exemplo do arquivo DesignerShell.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55925adf-2daa-4dc2-b1bf-61aa0190d734).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [hospedagem de Designer básico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/55925adf-2daa-4dc2-b1bf-61aa0190d734).

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma instância de um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <see langword="false" /> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> e opcionalmente libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo método público `Dispose()` e pelo método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` invoca o método `Dispose(Boolean)` protegido com o parâmetro `disposing` definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> invoca `Dispose` com disposing definido como `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> referências.

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o método `Dispose()` de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` pode ser chamado várias vezes por outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir `Dispose(Boolean)`, tome cuidado para não referenciar objetos que tenham sido descartados anteriormente em uma chamada anterior para `Dispose`.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] como implementar `Dispose(Boolean)`, consulte [implementar um método Dispose](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information, see `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte `Dispose` e `Finalize`, consulte [limpeza de recursos não gerenciados](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) e [substituindo o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources by calling <see langword="Dispose(false)" /> before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Tenta liberar recursos chamando <see langword="Dispose(false)" /> antes que o objeto seja recuperado pela coleta de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: Esse método limpa recursos chamando `Dispose(false)`.

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Substituir `Dispose(Boolean)` para personalizar a limpeza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> a ser associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> with the associated <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" /> com a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> associada.

trans-unit.source: You can associate message filters with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> to capture messages that occur from user interaction, such as mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode associar filtros de mensagem com o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> para capturar mensagens que ocorrem na interação do usuário, como eventos de mouse, eventos de teclado, eventos de pintura e layout.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> that describes the context of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que descreve o contexto do <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> object that contains information about the context of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo" /> que contém informações sobre o contexto do objeto de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains information about the area and the context of the area hit, including any designers hit and the area on the designer hit.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contém informações sobre a área e o contexto de ocorrência a área, incluindo qualquer ocorrência designers e a área em que a ocorrência de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o botão do mouse é liberado em cima de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragDrop%2A> occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragDrop%2A> Ocorre quando o botão do mouse é liberado acima de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse entra nos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A> occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A> Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse entra nos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A> method so that it always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragEnter%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse sai dos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragLeave%2A> occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragLeave%2A> Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse sai dos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragLeave%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer moves within the bounds of an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse é movido para dentro dos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnDragOver%2A> Ocorre quando o ponteiro do mouse se move dentro dos limites de um objeto durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> occurs when a drag operation is started.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> ocorre quando uma operação de arrastar é iniciada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to give you visual feedback during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> permite que a origem de uma operação de arrastar para modificar a aparência do ponteiro do mouse para fornecer comentários visuais durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> method so that it always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnGiveFeedback%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A> occurs when a key is pressed when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A> ocorre quando uma tecla é pressionada quando um objeto específico tem foco.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A> method to customize how to remove activities from a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyDown%2A> método para personalizar como remover atividades de uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is released.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma tecla é liberada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyUp%2A> occurs when a key is released when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyUp%2A> ocorre quando uma tecla é liberada quando um objeto específico tem foco.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnKeyUp%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when child objects should be repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando objetos filhos precisam ser reposicionados.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnLayout%2A> occurs when child objects should be repositioned within the parent container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnLayout%2A> ocorre quando objetos filho devem ser reposicionados dentro do contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando os itens selecionados ao arrastar o mouse são alterados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> occurs when you double-click the mouse.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> Ocorre quando você clicar duas vezes o mouse.

trans-unit.source: The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O clique duplo é determinado pelas configurações de mouse do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: Você pode definir o tempo entre cliques de um botão do mouse que é considerado um clique duplo em vez de dois cliques.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method to return `false` so that other components in the designer architecture can process the method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> método para retornar `false` para que outros componentes na arquitetura de designer podem processar o método.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseMove%2A> method to return the scroll position and to return `false` so that other components in the designer architecture can process the method.

trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o botão de rolagem do mouse é movido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseWheel%2A> occurs when the mouse wheel moves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseWheel%2A> Ocorre quando a roda do mouse se move.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseWheel%2A> method to zoom the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> object based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Delta%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> and to return `false` so that other components in the designer architecture can process the method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnMouseWheel%2A> método para ampliar o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> objeto com base no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs.Delta%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs> e retornar `false` para que podem processar outros componentes na arquitetura de designer o método.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que descreve a área a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> usado para obter informações sobre o tema.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma mensagem de pintura é recebida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnPaint%2A> occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnPaint%2A> Ocorre quando uma mensagem de pintura é recebida.

trans-unit.source: Use the parameters passed to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnPaint%2A> to determine the area to be painted, the theme used, and additional information about the event passed in the `PaintEventArgs`.
trans-unit.target: Use os parâmetros passados para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnPaint%2A> determinar a área de pintura, o tema usado, e informações adicionais sobre o evento passado a `PaintEventArgs`.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="PaintEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="PaintEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Rectangle" /> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="Rectangle" /> que descreve a área a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: An <see langword="AmbientTheme" /> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: Um <see langword="AmbientTheme" /> usado para obter informações sobre o tema.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve ser pintar seus adornos novamente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments` occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments` Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve ser redesenhado seus ornamentos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> que contém informações sobre o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: `OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: `OnQueryContinueDrag` Ocorre durante uma operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O `OnQueryContinueDrag` evento permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> method so that it always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnQueryContinueDrag%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do básico Designer hospedagem SDK exemplo do arquivo DesignerShell.cs.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> that the user scrolled.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> que o usuário rolou.

trans-unit.source: The position of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: A posição da barra de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user scrolls in a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário rola em um designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnScroll%2A> occurs when you use a scroll bar on a designer to scroll up, down, left, or right.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnScroll%2A> ocorre quando você usa uma barra de rolagem em um designer para rolar para cima, para baixo, esquerda, ou para a direita.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnScroll%2A> always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: A menos que substituída em uma classe derivada, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnScroll%2A> sempre retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The point at which to the context menu is shown.
trans-unit.target: O ponto no qual no menu de contexto é mostrado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho precisa mostrar um menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnShowContextMenu%2A> Ocorre quando o fluxo de trabalho deve mostrar um menu de contexto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnShowContextMenu%2A> method so that it always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnShowContextMenu%2A> método para que ele sempre retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the theme of the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o tema do fluxo de trabalho é alterado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnThemeChange%2A> occurs when you make changes to the workflow theme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.OnThemeChange%2A> ocorre quando você faz alterações para o tema do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> que está associada ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter" />.

trans-unit.source: A message filter responds to events in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: Um filtro de mensagem responde a eventos em um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.

trans-unit.source: The message filter is associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O filtro de mensagem é associado com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When an event occurs in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> it passes the message on to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Quando ocorre um evento no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> transmiti-la para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> devem ser tratados.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Message" /> to handle.
trans-unit.target: A <see langword="Message" /> a ser manipulada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a raw Win32 message must be processed.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma mensagem bruta do Win32 precisa ser processada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the message is handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a mensagem for manipulada, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> can receive raw Win32 messages from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> pode receber mensagens de Win32 brutas do sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: Messages forward to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Encaminham mensagens para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> devem ser tratados.
